item.description:
This event is playing a word game called Apples to Apples. I think it's a fun game. In addition to using words in the game, it also encourages talking, so I think it can be a fun way to practice.

I'll do my best to explain any words that you don't understand, but you might also consider bringing whatever bi-lingual dictionary you find most helpful.

Please sign up only if you are actually going to come, so I know how many people to look for.

Other native English speakers who would like to play and help people with their English are of course also welcome.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign on the table that says "ESL." I will also send the number for my mobile phone to anyone who signs up before 5:30PM.

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: English Word Game
